content:
When I compile 'my' guide I have this error returned for each logical model specified
The link 'StructureDefinition-xxx.sch' for "Schematron" cannot be resolved.
My understanding is that the best way to fix it is not to use the "layout-profile" , but a different one that does not include this reference.
if this is the right approach what I need to configure for telling the publisher to use, let's say, a "layout-model" layout for models, instead of the "layout-profile" ?
@Lloyd McKenzie this look like a template issue?
Yes. It's known. Hasn't gotten to the top of the stack yet
is there any additional information about my initial question ?
What's an IG I can use to test this?
